channel.title: Falling through world
channel.description:
I'm having a bit of an issue and I'm not sure what can be done to fix it. It just started yesterday after all that roll back stuff.
Now every time the server saves I log off. No matter where I am in the world when I log back on I'm suddenly falling in to the void and soon die. Wouldn't be so bad but I keep losing my building materials and tools.
What would have caused this to start? and/or is there anything I can do to fix it. Thanks

item.title: Falling through world
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

Also, since this started happening sometimes when you log in you log back in at spawn no matter where you were. I know it’s not as bad as falling through the world, since you don’t lose your items. But it can be pretty inconvenient

Read full topic
